title: Lightning Strikes Only Once in Toronto - SOLD
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Lightning Strikes Only Once in Toronto - SOLD
posts.post_content:
The Sovereign state of Mitchell was able to withstand a small bolt of lightning that struck his right shoulder the moment this image was created.  Otherwise the card is a fine, ungraded example of versatile player who could both throw the ball and catch the ball.  In five years of major league ball Fred pitched, but never had a winning record.  He then spent several years in Toronto before trying to return with the Highlanders in 1910 as a catcher.

Hardly a beater, this card can be yours for $24 shipped ($25 if you choose to pay with regular Paypal).  Put this two tool player in your bullpen where he can either warm up pitching or warm up catching.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10970/mitchell-f[/IMG]

as always...great cards....great posts...

and love the lyrics;)
